snippet: Lawyers for more than 20 media companies argued that documents related to the trial of George Zimmerman were improperly sealed.
abstract: Lawyers representing more than 20 media companies ask the Florida judge overseeing the trial of George Zimmerman, the neighborhood watch organizer who killed the teenager Trayvon Martin, to unseal the court file; argue that Zimmerman's lawyer did not submit evidence showing that it was necessary to keep the documents related to the trial private.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for more than 20 media companies argued that documents related to the trial of George Zimmerman were improperly sealed.

headline.seo: Media Companies Sue to Force Opening of Zimmerman File
headline.main: Media Companies Ask Judge to Open Florida Defendant’s File
headline.print_headline: Media Companies Ask Judge to Open Florida Defendant’s File
